The Evolution of Games

A bit of history

Yes, they're modern. But that doesn't stop us from already seeing an evolution in games. Below you will see a timeline of important moments in videogame history.

  • Tennis for Two is created on an analog computer

  • Spacewar! the first digital computer game is invented by Steve Russel

  • The first programming language is created in 1964 at Darthmouth enabling people to write software but also games

  • The first arcade game, Pong is put to use

  • A 3D fps (first person shooter) makes it's debut, Maze Wars

  • One of the most recognisable titles to this date makes it's first appearance: Pac-Man to this day is still a celebrated game

  • Another greatly appreciated video game comes out: Tetris. Many versions of this game from Alexey Pajitnov are still being created.

  • The Game Boy is introduced and it is an instant hit!

  • Solitaire is bundled with the Windows operating system, it quickly becomes extremely popular due to it's ease to come across.

  • The 1990s are a great decade for videogames. Many games establish their saga during this time. Be it Tomb Raider, Warcraft: Orcs and Humans, Mortal Combat and many others

  • Kasparov, the world famous chess player gets beaten in a game of chess by a computer produced at IBM

  • The Sims is released and quickly becomes the best selling game, breaking records

  • The Xbox is released by Microsoft

  • Steam (pc games distribution platform) is introduced

  • The Nintendo DS comes out

  • The Xbox 360 is released now

  • One year later it is the turn of the Wii to come out

  • Minecraft comes out. This surprising indie game surpasses everything that was expected. It becomes a hit like never seen before

  • Twitch (online video streaming platform) is acquired by amazon and and starts popularizing watching competitive gaming

  • Pok√©mon Go comes out. It creates controversy because of it's real world nature. It also becomes the first hyper popular alternate reality (digital elements merged with the real world) video game

  • Fortnite comes out. It along with PUBG greatly influenced the many other battle royale style games which came after

  • With a covid pandemic released on the world, many new people adopted video-games. Among US, Animal Crossing: New Horizons and others were huge successes
